name: Azure Redis Cache memory usage is getting closer to max memory limit
description: this rule checks if the Azure Redis Cache memory usage is getting closer to the maximum memory limit.

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Identify the cause of the high memory usage: Check if there are any long-running tasks or applications that are consuming excessive amounts of memory. You can use the Azure portal or the Redis diagnostic logs to identify these issues.
